note:
Swiss-based musician - bass, guitar, keys, vocals of varying competencies. Played in Sydney in the 80s, Brisbane in the 90s, Myspace in the 00s + a rogue folk-acoustic set somewhere in there, nothing at all in the 10s!, and now active again. Several solo, collaborative and band activities locally and in Australia.

Avatar is a picture of me - a bald guy with a long white beard singing into a microphone.

Header image is a picture of a wall with several of my guitars and basses hanging on it.

Retired soldier, I spent about 30 years in the military (USMC/Army). Also recently retired computer systems engineer. So, I'm just plain retired. I need something to do so, I decided on photography and bird watching as a hobby. Unless otherwise stated, all photographs I post are my own.

I take pictures and want to share them with you, so please follow my blog.

#TheScienceofBirds

note:
Building knowledge, block by block! 
 
Welcome to Life Noggin! We answer YOUR questions about life, the universe, and just about everything else! 
 
What if all the cats suddenly disappeared? What if the Earth had dozens of moons? Join our host Blocko (directed and voiced by Pat Graziosi) every Monday as he thinks his way through the internet's most entertaining hypotheticals. Submit your questions– no matter how big or small– for the chance to have them answered on the channel!
